content: You are Beatrice. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Nikolas., Nikolas just said to you: '"Excellent work, Beatrice! Right on schedule, too. Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Nikolas! Glad to hear it went smoothly."
